manifest.name: File Ignore
manifest.description: Control file indexing by adding or removing dot prefix to show or hide files, providing a .gitignore-like experience
manifest.author: Chen

data.manifestValue: Control file indexing by adding or removing dot prefix to show or hide files, providing a .gitignore-like experience
data.communityListValue: Controls file indexing by managing dot prefixes on files/folders to truly hide/exclude them, providing a .gitignore-like experience.
